pkgmetadata.longdescription: py-bcrypt is an implementation the OpenBSD Blowfish password hashingalgorithm, as described in "A Future-Adaptable Password Scheme" byNiels Provos and David Mazieres.This system hashes passwords using a version of Bruce Schneier'sBlowfish block cipher with modifications designed to raise the costof off-line password cracking. The computation cost of the algorithmis parametised, so it can be increased as computers get faster.
